To those having problems with magnet links, I recommend the BitComet client: very easy to use, to configure, and it automatically loads every file trees from a torrent with more than one file. So that you can select wich files to download, one by one, or everything at once.

I still use BitTorrent when I can download the .torrent file, but I only use BitComet for direct magnet links.
Note that you don't have to bookmark every magnet from your web browser, BitComet allows you to store the magnet links inside the program if you want to use it more than once !
